text: I'd like to think Helen very much understood what it was to be disadvantaged in the medical field. And that that was something that she never let dictate her choices.
author: Mary Stuart Masterson

text: If I had the medical clearance to fight, I would want to fight the best. The best would be Mayweather.
author: Roberto Duran

text: Even people who feel perfectly comfortable investing in the stock market and owning their own homes often have qualms about individual medical accounts or Social Security private accounts.
author: Jacob Hacker

text: It is false to suggest that medical breakthroughs come only through government research.
author: Roger Wicker

text: The space industry is developing and delivering benefits that tie into our immediate needs and priorities here on Earth-for example, medical and materials research, and satellite communications.
author: Marc Garneau
